df-ply
blocks.content: Define the set of polynomials on the complex numbers with coefficients in the given subset. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-Jul-2014.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-ply(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5) {
  |- wceq(cply, cmpt(s0, cpw(cc), cab(s1, wrex(s2, cn0, wrex(s3, co(cun(cv(s0), csn(nat0)), cmap, cn0), wceq(cv(s1), cmpt(s4, cc, csu(s5, co(nat0, cfz, cv(s2)), co(cfv(cv(s3), cv(s5)), cmul, co(cv(s4), cexp, cv(s5)))))))))))
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s3, s5)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s3, s4)
  -| diffss(s1, s5)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s1, s4)
  -| diffss(s2, s5)
  -| diffss(s0, s5)
  -| diffss(s4, s5)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s2, s4)
  -| diffss(s0, s4)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-ply(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5) {
  ⊢ Poly =(s0 ∈ P(ℂ)↦ { s1 | ∃(s2 ∈ ℕ0, ∃(s3 ∈((s0 ⋃ { 0 })[↦]ℕ0), s1 =(s4 ∈ ℂ ↦ sum(s5 ∈(0[...]s2),((s3 ` s5)[×](s4[^]s5))))))})
  ⊣ d(s1, s3)
  ⊣ d(s3, s5)
  ⊣ d(s2, s3)
  ⊣ d(s0, s3)
  ⊣ d(s3, s4)
  ⊣ d(s1, s5)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s1, s4)
  ⊣ d(s2, s5)
  ⊣ d(s0, s5)
  ⊣ d(s4, s5)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s2, s4)
  ⊣ d(s0, s4)
}

blocks.name: df-coe
blocks.content: Define the coefficient function for a polynomial. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 22-Jul-2014.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-coe(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4) {
  |- wceq(ccoe, cmpt(s0, cfv(cply, cc), crio(s1, co(cc, cmap, cn0), wrex(s2, cn0, wa(wceq(cima(cv(s1), cfv(cuz, co(cv(s2), caddc, nat1))), csn(nat0)), wceq(cv(s0), cmpt(s3, cc, csu(s4, co(nat0, cfz, cv(s2)), co(cfv(cv(s1), cv(s4)), cmul, co(cv(s3), cexp, cv(s4)))))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s1, s4)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s4)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s4)
  -| diffss(s3, s4)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-coe(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4) {
  ⊢ coeff =(s0 ∈(Poly ` ℂ)↦ iota(s1 ∈(ℂ[↦]ℕ0), ∃(s2 ∈ ℕ0,((s1 "(ℤ≥ `(s2[+]1)))= { 0 } ∧ s0 =(s3 ∈ ℂ ↦ sum(s4 ∈(0[...]s2),((s1 ` s4)[×](s3[^]s4))))))))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s1, s4)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s3)
  ⊣ d(s0, s4)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, s3)
  ⊣ d(s2, s4)
  ⊣ d(s3, s4)
  ⊣ d(s2, s3)
}

} = {
  elpwid(c1, cc, wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)))
  mptrcl(hs0, c0, cply, c1, cpw(cc), cab(hs1, wrex(hs3, cn0, wrex(hs5, co(cun(cv(hs0), csn(nat0)), cmap, cn0), wceq(cv(hs1), cmpt(hs2, cc, csu(hs4, co(nat0, cfz, cv(hs3)), co(cfv(cv(hs5), cv(hs4)), cmul, co(cv(hs2), cexp, cv(hs4))))))))))
  df-ply(hs0, hs1, hs3, hs5, hs2, hs4)
  diff.hs0.c(cpw(cc))
  diff.hs1.s(hs5)
  diff.hs5.s(hs4)
  diff.hs3.s(hs5)
  diff.hs0.s(hs5)
  diff.hs5.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs4)
  diff.hs1.s(hs3)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)

  diff.hs2.s(hs4)

  diff.hs3.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm plybss(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈(Poly ` c1)→ c1 ⊆ ℂ)
} = {
  elpwid(c1, cc, c0 ∈(Poly ` c1))
  mptrcl(hs0, c0, cply, c1, P(ℂ), { hs1 | ∃(hs3 ∈ ℕ0, ∃(hs5 ∈((hs0 ⋃ { 0 })[↦]ℕ0), hs1 =(hs2 ∈ ℂ ↦ sum(hs4 ∈(0[...]hs3),((hs5 ` hs4)[×](hs2[^]hs4))))))})
  df-ply(hs0, hs1, hs3, hs5, hs2, hs4)
  diff.hs0.c(P(ℂ))
  diff.hs1.s(hs5)
  diff.hs5.s(hs4)
  diff.hs3.s(hs5)
  diff.hs0.s(hs5)
  diff.hs5.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs4)
  diff.hs1.s(hs3)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs3.s(hs4)
  diff.hs0.s(hs4)
  diff.hs2.s(hs4)
  diff.hs0.s(hs3)
  diff.hs3.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
}

  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)

  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)

  -| diffsc(s1, c0)

  -| diffsc(s3, c1)
} = {
  biadanii(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wss(c1, cc), wrex(s0, cn0, wrex(s1, co(cun(c1, csn(nat0)), cmap, cn0), wceq(c0, cmpt(s2, cc, csu(s3, co(nat0, cfz, cv(s0)), co(cfv(cv(s1), cv(s3)), cmul, co(cv(s2), cexp, cv(s3)))))))))

thm plyssc(class c0) {

  diff.hs0.c(cmpt(s1, cn0, cif(c1, nat0, wcel(cv(s1), co(nat0, cfz, c0)))))
}

thm ply1term(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(w3a(wss(c0, cc), wcel(c1, c0), wcel(c2, cn0)), wcel(c3, cfv(cply, c0)))
  -| wceq(c3, cmpt(s0, cc, co(c1, cmul, co(cv(s0), cexp, c2))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  syl6eleq(c3, cfv(cply, c0), cfv(cply, cun(c0, csn(nat0))), w3a(wss(c0, cc), wcel(c1, c0), wcel(c2, cn0)))
  eqeltrd(c3, cfv(cply, cun(c0, csn(nat0))), cmpt(s0, cc, csu(hs0, co(nat0, cfz, c2), co(cif(c1, nat0, wceq(cv(hs0), c2)), cmul, co(cv(s0), cexp, cv(hs0))))), w3a(wss(c0, cc), wcel(c1, c0), wcel(c2, cn0)))
  stoic3(wss(c0, cc), wcel(c1, c0), wcel(c2, cn0), wceq(c3, cmpt(s0, cc, csu(hs0, co(nat0, cfz, c2), co(cif(c1, nat0, wceq(cv(hs0), c2)), cmul, co(cv(s0), cexp, cv(hs0)))))), wcel(c1, cc))
  ssel2(c0, cc, c1)
  ply1termlem(s0, hs0, c1, c2, c3)
  elplyd(s0, hs0, c2, cif(c1, nat0, wceq(cv(hs0), c2)), cun(c0, csn(nat0)), w3a(wss(c0, cc), wcel(c1, c0), wcel(c2, cn0)))
  unssd(c0, csn(nat0), cc, w3a(wss(c0, cc), wcel(c1, c0), wcel(c2, cn0)))
  simp1(wss(c0, cc), wcel(c1, c0), wcel(c2, cn0))
  snssd(nat0, cc, w3a(wss(c0, cc), wcel(c1, c0), wcel(c2, cn0)))
  0cnd(w3a(wss(c0, cc), wcel(c1, c0), wcel(c2, cn0)))
  simp3(wss(c0, cc), wcel(c1, c0), wcel(c2, cn0))
  sylancl(wa(w3a(wss(c0, cc), wcel(c1, c0), wcel(c2, cn0)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cfz, c2))), wcel(cif(c1, nat0, wceq(cv(hs0), c2)), cun(c0, csn(nat0))), wcel(c1, cun(c0, csn(nat0))), wcel(nat0, cun(c0, csn(nat0))))
  syl(wa(w3a(wss(c0, cc), wcel(c1, c0), wcel(c2, cn0)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cfz, c2))), wcel(c1, cun(c0, csn(nat0))), wcel(c1, c0))
  simpl2(wss(c0, cc), wcel(c1, c0), wcel(c2, cn0), wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cfz, c2)))
  elun1(c1, c0, csn(nat0))
  mpbir(wcel(nat0, cun(c0, csn(nat0))), wss(csn(nat0), cun(c0, csn(nat0))))
  ssun2(csn(nat0), c0)
  snss(nat0, cun(c0, csn(nat0)))
  c0ex()
  ifcl(c1, cun(c0, csn(nat0)), nat0, wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  plyun0(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.cif.s(s0, c1, nat0, wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cun.s(s0, c0, csn(nat0))
  diff.csn.s(s0, nat0)
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(cun(c0, csn(nat0)))
  diff.w3a.s(s0, wss(c0, cc), wcel(c1, c0), wcel(c2, cn0))
  diff.wss.s(s0, c0, cc)
  diff.cc.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c1, c0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c2, cn0)
  diff.cn0.s(s0)

}

thm ply1term(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ⊆ ℂ ∧ c1 ∈ c0 ∧ c2 ∈ ℕ0)→ c3 ∈(Poly ` c0))
  ⊣ c3 =(s0 ∈ ℂ ↦(c1[×](s0[^]c2)))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
} = {
  syl6eleq(c3, (Poly ` c0), (Poly `(c0 ⋃ { 0 })), (c0 ⊆ ℂ ∧ c1 ∈ c0 ∧ c2 ∈ ℕ0))
  eqeltrd(c3, (Poly `(c0 ⋃ { 0 })), (s0 ∈ ℂ ↦ sum(hs0 ∈(0[...]c2),(if(hs0 = c2, c1, 0)[×](s0[^]hs0)))), (c0 ⊆ ℂ ∧ c1 ∈ c0 ∧ c2 ∈ ℕ0))
  stoic3(c0 ⊆ ℂ, c1 ∈ c0, c2 ∈ ℕ0, c3 =(s0 ∈ ℂ ↦ sum(hs0 ∈(0[...]c2),(if(hs0 = c2, c1, 0)[×](s0[^]hs0)))), c1 ∈ ℂ)
  ssel2(c0, cc, c1)
  ply1termlem(s0, hs0, c1, c2, c3)
  elplyd(s0, hs0, c2, if(hs0 = c2, c1, 0), (c0 ⋃ { 0 }), (c0 ⊆ ℂ ∧ c1 ∈ c0 ∧ c2 ∈ ℕ0))
  unssd(c0, { 0 }, cc, (c0 ⊆ ℂ ∧ c1 ∈ c0 ∧ c2 ∈ ℕ0))
  simp1(c0 ⊆ ℂ, c1 ∈ c0, c2 ∈ ℕ0)
  snssd(nat0, cc, (c0 ⊆ ℂ ∧ c1 ∈ c0 ∧ c2 ∈ ℕ0))
  0cnd((c0 ⊆ ℂ ∧ c1 ∈ c0 ∧ c2 ∈ ℕ0))
  simp3(c0 ⊆ ℂ, c1 ∈ c0, c2 ∈ ℕ0)
  sylancl(((c0 ⊆ ℂ ∧ c1 ∈ c0 ∧ c2 ∈ ℕ0)∧ hs0 ∈(0[...]c2)), if(hs0 = c2, c1, 0)∈(c0 ⋃ { 0 }), c1 ∈(c0 ⋃ { 0 }), 0 ∈(c0 ⋃ { 0 }))
  syl(((c0 ⊆ ℂ ∧ c1 ∈ c0 ∧ c2 ∈ ℕ0)∧ hs0 ∈(0[...]c2)), c1 ∈(c0 ⋃ { 0 }), c1 ∈ c0)
  simpl2(c0 ⊆ ℂ, c1 ∈ c0, c2 ∈ ℕ0, hs0 ∈(0[...]c2))
  elun1(c1, c0, { 0 })
  mpbir(0 ∈(c0 ⋃ { 0 }), { 0 } ⊆(c0 ⋃ { 0 }))
  ssun2({ 0 }, c0)
  snss(nat0, (c0 ⋃ { 0 }))
  c0ex()
  ifcl(c1, (c0 ⋃ { 0 }), nat0, hs0 = c2)
  plyun0(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.cif.s(s0, c1, nat0, hs0 = c2)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cun.s(s0, c0, { 0 })
  diff.csn.s(s0, nat0)
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c((c0 ⋃ { 0 }))
  diff.w3a.s(s0, c0 ⊆ ℂ, c1 ∈ c0, c2 ∈ ℕ0)
  diff.wss.s(s0, c0, cc)
  diff.cc.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c1, c0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c2, cn0)
  diff.cn0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.w((c0 ⊆ ℂ ∧ c1 ∈ c0 ∧ c2 ∈ ℕ0))
}

blocks.name: plypow
blocks.content: A power is a polynomial. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-Jul-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm plypow(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(w3a(wss(c0, cc), wcel(nat1, c0), wcel(c1, cn0)), wcel(cmpt(s0, cc, co(cv(s0), cexp, c1)), cfv(cply, c0)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  eqeltrrd(cmpt(s0, cc, co(cv(s0), cexp, c1)), cfv(cply, c0), cmpt(s0, cc, co(nat1, cmul, co(cv(s0), cexp, c1))), w3a(wss(c0, cc), wcel(nat1, c0), wcel(c1, cn0)))
  mpteq2dva(s0, cc, co(nat1, cmul, co(cv(s0), cexp, c1)), co(cv(s0), cexp, c1), w3a(wss(c0, cc), wcel(nat1, c0), wcel(c1, cn0)))
  mulid2d(co(cv(s0), cexp, c1), wa(w3a(wss(c0, cc), wcel(nat1, c0), wcel(c1, cn0)), wcel(cv(s0), cc)))
  syl2anr(w3a(wss(c0, cc), wcel(nat1, c0), wcel(c1, cn0)), wcel(cv(s0), cc), wcel(co(cv(s0), cexp, c1), cc), wcel(cv(s0), cc), wcel(c1, cn0))
  id(wcel(cv(s0), cc))
  simp3(wss(c0, cc), wcel(nat1, c0), wcel(c1, cn0))
  expcl(cv(s0), c1)
  ply1term(s0, c0, nat1, c1, cmpt(s0, cc, co(nat1, cmul, co(cv(s0), cexp, c1))))
  eqid(cmpt(s0, cc, co(nat1, cmul, co(cv(s0), cexp, c1))))
  diff.w3a.s(s0, wss(c0, cc), wcel(nat1, c0), wcel(c1, cn0))
  diff.wss.s(s0, c0, cc)
  diff.cc.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, nat1, c0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c1, cn0)
  diff.cn0.s(s0)
  diff.nat1.s(s0)
}

thm plypow(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ⊆ ℂ ∧ 1 ∈ c0 ∧ c1 ∈ ℕ0)→(s0 ∈ ℂ ↦(s0[^]c1))∈(Poly ` c0))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  eqeltrrd((s0 ∈ ℂ ↦(s0[^]c1)), (Poly ` c0), (s0 ∈ ℂ ↦(1[×](s0[^]c1))), (c0 ⊆ ℂ ∧ 1 ∈ c0 ∧ c1 ∈ ℕ0))
  mpteq2dva(s0, cc, (1[×](s0[^]c1)), (s0[^]c1), (c0 ⊆ ℂ ∧ 1 ∈ c0 ∧ c1 ∈ ℕ0))
  mulid2d((s0[^]c1), ((c0 ⊆ ℂ ∧ 1 ∈ c0 ∧ c1 ∈ ℕ0)∧ s0 ∈ ℂ))
  syl2anr((c0 ⊆ ℂ ∧ 1 ∈ c0 ∧ c1 ∈ ℕ0), s0 ∈ ℂ, (s0[^]c1)∈ ℂ, s0 ∈ ℂ, c1 ∈ ℕ0)
  id(s0 ∈ ℂ)
  simp3(c0 ⊆ ℂ, 1 ∈ c0, c1 ∈ ℕ0)
  expcl(s0, c1)
  ply1term(s0, c0, nat1, c1, (s0 ∈ ℂ ↦(1[×](s0[^]c1))))
  eqid((s0 ∈ ℂ ↦(1[×](s0[^]c1))))
  diff.w3a.s(s0, c0 ⊆ ℂ, 1 ∈ c0, c1 ∈ ℕ0)
  diff.wss.s(s0, c0, cc)
  diff.cc.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, nat1, c0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c1, cn0)

}

blocks.name: plyconst
blocks.content: A constant function is a polynomial. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-Jul-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm plyconst(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wss(c0, cc), wcel(c1, c0)), wcel(cxp(cc, csn(c1)), cfv(cply, c0)))
} = {
  eqeltrrd(cxp(cc, csn(c1)), cfv(cply, c0), cmpt(hs0, cc, co(c1, cmul, co(cv(hs0), cexp, nat0))), wa(wss(c0, cc), wcel(c1, c0)))
  syl6eqr(cmpt(hs0, cc, co(c1, cmul, co(cv(hs0), cexp, nat0))), cxp(cc, csn(c1)), cmpt(hs0, cc, c1), wa(wss(c0, cc), wcel(c1, c0)))
  mpteq2dva(hs0, cc, co(c1, cmul, co(cv(hs0), cexp, nat0)), c1, wa(wss(c0, cc), wcel(c1, c0)))
  eqtrd(co(c1, cmul, co(cv(hs0), cexp, nat0)), c1, co(c1, cmul, nat1), wa(wa(wss(c0, cc), wcel(c1, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cc)))
  oveq2d(c1, cmul, co(cv(hs0), cexp, nat0), nat1, wa(wa(wss(c0, cc), wcel(c1, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cc)))
  adantl(wa(wss(c0, cc), wcel(c1, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cexp, nat0), nat1))
  exp0(cv(hs0))
  mulid1d(c1, wa(wa(wss(c0, cc), wcel(c1, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cc)))
  adantr(wa(wss(c0, cc), wcel(c1, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wcel(c1, cc))
  ssel2(c0, cc, c1)
  fconstmpt(hs0, cc, c1)
  mp3an3(wss(c0, cc), wcel(c1, c0), wcel(cmpt(hs0, cc, co(c1, cmul, co(cv(hs0), cexp, nat0))), cfv(cply, c0)), wcel(nat0, cn0))
  0nn0()
  ply1term(hs0, c0, c1, nat0, cmpt(hs0, cc, co(c1, cmul, co(cv(hs0), cexp, nat0))))
  eqid(cmpt(hs0, cc, co(c1, cmul, co(cv(hs0), cexp, nat0))))
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wss(c0, cc), wcel(c1, c0)))
  diff.hs0.c(cc)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(nat0)
}

thm plyconst(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ⊆ ℂ ∧ c1 ∈ c0)→(ℂ × { c1 })∈(Poly ` c0))
} = {
  eqeltrrd((ℂ × { c1 }), (Poly ` c0), (hs0 ∈ ℂ ↦(c1[×](hs0[^]0))), (c0 ⊆ ℂ ∧ c1 ∈ c0))
  syl6eqr((hs0 ∈ ℂ ↦(c1[×](hs0[^]0))), (ℂ × { c1 }), (hs0 ∈ ℂ ↦ c1), (c0 ⊆ ℂ ∧ c1 ∈ c0))
  mpteq2dva(hs0, cc, (c1[×](hs0[^]0)), c1, (c0 ⊆ ℂ ∧ c1 ∈ c0))
  eqtrd((c1[×](hs0[^]0)), c1, (c1[×]1), ((c0 ⊆ ℂ ∧ c1 ∈ c0)∧ hs0 ∈ ℂ))
  oveq2d(c1, cmul, (hs0[^]0), nat1, ((c0 ⊆ ℂ ∧ c1 ∈ c0)∧ hs0 ∈ ℂ))
  adantl((c0 ⊆ ℂ ∧ c1 ∈ c0), hs0 ∈ ℂ, (hs0[^]0)= 1)
  exp0(hs0)
  mulid1d(c1, ((c0 ⊆ ℂ ∧ c1 ∈ c0)∧ hs0 ∈ ℂ))
  adantr((c0 ⊆ ℂ ∧ c1 ∈ c0), hs0 ∈ ℂ, c1 ∈ ℂ)
  ssel2(c0, cc, c1)
  fconstmpt(hs0, cc, c1)
  mp3an3(c0 ⊆ ℂ, c1 ∈ c0, (hs0 ∈ ℂ ↦(c1[×](hs0[^]0)))∈(Poly ` c0), 0 ∈ ℕ0)
  0nn0()
  ply1term(hs0, c0, c1, nat0, (hs0 ∈ ℂ ↦(c1[×](hs0[^]0))))
  eqid((hs0 ∈ ℂ ↦(c1[×](hs0[^]0))))
  diff.hs0.w((c0 ⊆ ℂ ∧ c1 ∈ c0))
  diff.hs0.c(cc)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(nat0)
}

blocks.name: ply0
blocks.content: The zero function is a polynomial. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-Jul-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm ply0(class c0) {
  |- wi(wss(c0, cc), wcel(c0p, cfv(cply, c0)))
} = {
  syl6eleq(c0p, cfv(cply, c0), cfv(cply, cun(c0, csn(nat0))), wss(c0, cc))
  syl5eqel(c0p, cfv(cply, cun(c0, csn(nat0))), cxp(cc, csn(nat0)), wss(c0, cc))
  df-0p()
  sylancl(wss(c0, cc), wcel(cxp(cc, csn(nat0)), cfv(cply, cun(c0, csn(nat0)))), wss(cun(c0, csn(nat0)), cc), wcel(nat0, cun(c0, csn(nat0))))
  unssd(c0, csn(nat0), cc, wss(c0, cc))
  id(wss(c0, cc))
  snssd(nat0, cc, wss(c0, cc))
  0cnd(wss(c0, cc))
  mpbir(wcel(nat0, cun(c0, csn(nat0))), wss(csn(nat0), cun(c0, csn(nat0))))
  ssun2(csn(nat0), c0)
  snss(nat0, cun(c0, csn(nat0)))
  c0ex()
  plyconst(cun(c0, csn(nat0)), nat0)
  plyun0(c0)
}

thm ply0(class c0) {
  ⊢ (c0 ⊆ ℂ → 0p ∈(Poly ` c0))
} = {
  syl6eleq(c0p, (Poly ` c0), (Poly `(c0 ⋃ { 0 })), c0 ⊆ ℂ)
  syl5eqel(c0p, (Poly `(c0 ⋃ { 0 })), (ℂ × { 0 }), c0 ⊆ ℂ)
  df-0p()
  sylancl(c0 ⊆ ℂ, (ℂ × { 0 })∈(Poly `(c0 ⋃ { 0 })), (c0 ⋃ { 0 })⊆ ℂ, 0 ∈(c0 ⋃ { 0 }))
  unssd(c0, { 0 }, cc, c0 ⊆ ℂ)
  id(c0 ⊆ ℂ)
  snssd(nat0, cc, c0 ⊆ ℂ)
  0cnd(c0 ⊆ ℂ)

  c0ex()
  plyconst((c0 ⋃ { 0 }), nat0)
  plyun0(c0)

blocks.name: plyid
blocks.content: The identity function is a polynomial. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-Jul-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm plyid(class c0) {
  |- wi(wa(wss(c0, cc), wcel(nat1, c0)), wcel(cidp, cfv(cply, c0)))
} = {
  syl5eqel(cidp, cfv(cply, c0), cmpt(hs0, cc, co(cv(hs0), cexp, nat1)), wa(wss(c0, cc), wcel(nat1, c0)))
  3eqtr4ri(cidp, cmpt(hs0, cc, co(cv(hs0), cexp, nat1)), cmpt(hs0, cc, cv(hs0)), cres(cid, cc))
  mptresid(hs0, cc)
  mpteq2ia(hs0, cc, co(cv(hs0), cexp, nat1), cv(hs0))
  exp1(cv(hs0))
  df-idp()
  mp3an3(wss(c0, cc), wcel(nat1, c0), wcel(cmpt(hs0, cc, co(cv(hs0), cexp, nat1)), cfv(cply, c0)), wcel(nat1, cn0))
  1nn0()
  plypow(hs0, c0, nat1)
  diff.hs0.c(cc)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(nat1)
}

thm plyid(class c0) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ⊆ ℂ ∧ 1 ∈ c0)→ Xp ∈(Poly ` c0))
} = {

  mptresid(hs0, cc)
  mpteq2ia(hs0, cc, (hs0[^]1), hs0)
  exp1(hs0)
  df-idp()
  mp3an3(c0 ⊆ ℂ, 1 ∈ c0, (hs0 ∈ ℂ ↦(hs0[^]1))∈(Poly ` c0), 1 ∈ ℕ0)
  1nn0()
  plypow(hs0, c0, nat1)
  diff.hs0.c(cc)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(nat1)
}

blocks.name: plyeq0lem
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ plyeq0 . If ` A ` is the coefficient function for a nonzero polynomial such that ` P ( z ) = sum_ k e. NN0 A ( k ) x. z ^ k = 0 ` for every ` z e. CC ` and ` A ( M ) ` is the nonzero leading coefficient, then the function ` F ( z ) = P ( z ) / z ^ M ` is a sum of powers of ` 1 / z ` , and so the limit of this function as ` z ~~> +oo ` is the constant term, ` A ( M ) ` . But ` F ( z ) = 0 ` everywhere, so this limit is also equal to zero so that ` A ( M ) = 0 ` , a contradiction. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 22-Jul-2014.)

blocks.name: plyeq0
blocks.content: If a polynomial is zero at every point (or even just zero at the positive integers), then all the coefficients must be zero. This is the basis for the method of equating coefficients of equal polynomials, and ensures that ~ df-coe is well-defined. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 22-Jul-2014.)
blocks.origin:

  |- wi(w0, wceq(c0, cxp(cn0, csn(nat0))))

  -| wi(w0, wceq(c0p, cmpt(s0, cc, csu(s1, co(nat0, cfz, c2), co(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), cmul, co(cv(s0), cexp, cv(s1)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)

blocks.name: plypf1
blocks.content: Write the set of complex polynomials in a subring in terms of the abstract polynomial construction. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-Jul-2015.) (Proof shortened by AV, 29-Sep-2019.)

  -| diffss(s0, s1)

  a1ii(wi(w0, wcel(co(c0, cof(caddc), c1), cfv(cply, c2))), diffsc(s1, c0))

  elmapg(cun(c2, csn(nat0)), universe, cn0, universe, c5)

  sylancl(w0, wb(wcel(c6, co(cun(c2, csn(nat0)), cmap, cn0)), wf(c6, cn0, cun(c2, csn(nat0)))), wcel(cun(c2, csn(nat0)), universe), wcel(cn0, universe))
  sylancl(w0, wcel(cun(c2, csn(nat0)), universe), wss(cun(c2, csn(nat0)), cc), wcel(cc, universe))
  unssd(c2, csn(nat0), cc, w0)
  syl(w0, wss(c2, cc), wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c2)))

thm plyaddlem(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0[oF(+)]c1)∈(Poly ` c2))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈(Poly ` c2))
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈(Poly ` c2))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧(s0 ∈ c2 ∧ s1 ∈ c2))→(s0[+]s1)∈ c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ ℕ0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c4 ∈ ℕ0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c5 ∈((c2 ⋃ { 0 })[↦]ℕ0))
  ⊣ (w0 → c6 ∈((c2 ⋃ { 0 })[↦]ℕ0))
  ⊣ (w0 →(c5 "(ℤ≥ `(c3[+]1)))= { 0 })
  ⊣ (w0 →(c6 "(ℤ≥ `(c4[+]1)))= { 0 })
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 =(s2 ∈ ℂ ↦ sum(s3 ∈(0[...]c3),((c5 ` s3)[×](s2[^]s3)))))
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 =(s2 ∈ ℂ ↦ sum(s3 ∈(0[...]c4),((c6 ` s3)[×](s2[^]s3)))))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, s3)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s3)
  ⊣ d(s2, s3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c5)
  ⊣ d(s0, c6)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c5)
  ⊣ d(s1, c6)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c2)
  ⊣ d(s2, c3)
  ⊣ d(s2, c4)
  ⊣ d(s2, c5)
  ⊣ d(s2, c6)
  ⊣ d(s3, c2)
  ⊣ d(s3, c3)
  ⊣ d(s3, c4)
  ⊣ d(s3, c6)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
  ⊣ d(s2, w0)
  ⊣ d(s3, w0)
} = {
  a1ii((w0 →(c0[oF(+)]c1)∈(Poly ` c2)), d(s0, s2))
  a1ii((w0 →(c0[oF(+)]c1)∈(Poly ` c2)), d(s0, s3))
  a1ii((w0 →(c0[oF(+)]c1)∈(Poly ` c2)), d(s1, s2))
  a1ii((w0 →(c0[oF(+)]c1)∈(Poly ` c2)), d(s1, s3))
  a1ii((w0 →(c0[oF(+)]c1)∈(Poly ` c2)), d(s0, c0))
  a1ii((w0 →(c0[oF(+)]c1)∈(Poly ` c2)), d(s0, c1))
  a1ii((w0 →(c0[oF(+)]c1)∈(Poly ` c2)), d(s0, c6))
  a1ii((w0 →(c0[oF(+)]c1)∈(Poly ` c2)), d(s1, c0))
  a1ii((w0 →(c0[oF(+)]c1)∈(Poly ` c2)), d(s1, c1))
  a1ii((w0 →(c0[oF(+)]c1)∈(Poly ` c2)), d(s2, c0))

thm plymullem(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0[oF(×)]c1)∈(Poly ` c2))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈(Poly ` c2))
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈(Poly ` c2))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧(s0 ∈ c2 ∧ s1 ∈ c2))→(s0[+]s1)∈ c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ ℕ0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c4 ∈ ℕ0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c5 ∈((c2 ⋃ { 0 })[↦]ℕ0))
  ⊣ (w0 → c6 ∈((c2 ⋃ { 0 })[↦]ℕ0))
  ⊣ (w0 →(c5 "(ℤ≥ `(c3[+]1)))= { 0 })
  ⊣ (w0 →(c6 "(ℤ≥ `(c4[+]1)))= { 0 })
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 =(s2 ∈ ℂ ↦ sum(s3 ∈(0[...]c3),((c5 ` s3)[×](s2[^]s3)))))
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 =(s2 ∈ ℂ ↦ sum(s3 ∈(0[...]c4),((c6 ` s3)[×](s2[^]s3)))))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧(s0 ∈ c2 ∧ s1 ∈ c2))→(s0[×]s1)∈ c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, s3)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s3)
  ⊣ d(s2, s3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c5)
  ⊣ d(s0, c6)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c5)
  ⊣ d(s1, c6)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c2)
  ⊣ d(s2, c3)
  ⊣ d(s2, c4)
  ⊣ d(s2, c5)
  ⊣ d(s2, c6)
  ⊣ d(s3, c2)
  ⊣ d(s3, c3)
  ⊣ d(s3, c4)
  ⊣ d(s3, c6)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
  ⊣ d(s2, w0)
  ⊣ d(s3, w0)
} = {
  a1ii((w0 →(c0[oF(×)]c1)∈(Poly ` c2)), d(s0, s2))
  a1ii((w0 →(c0[oF(×)]c1)∈(Poly ` c2)), d(s1, s2))
  a1ii((w0 →(c0[oF(×)]c1)∈(Poly ` c2)), d(s0, c0))
  a1ii((w0 →(c0[oF(×)]c1)∈(Poly ` c2)), d(s0, c1))
  a1ii((w0 →(c0[oF(×)]c1)∈(Poly ` c2)), d(s1, c0))
  a1ii((w0 →(c0[oF(×)]c1)∈(Poly ` c2)), d(s1, c1))
  a1ii((w0 →(c0[oF(×)]c1)∈(Poly ` c2)), d(s2, c0))
  a1ii((w0 →(c0[oF(×)]c1)∈(Poly ` c2)), d(s2, c1))
  syl6eleq((c0[oF(×)]c1), (Poly ` c2), (Poly `(c2 ⋃ { 0 })), w0)
  eqeltrd((c0[oF(×)]c1), (Poly `(c2 ⋃ { 0 })), (s2 ∈ ℂ ↦ sum(hs0 ∈(0[...](c3[+]c4)),(sum(s3 ∈(0[...]hs0),((c5 ` s3)[×](c6 `(hs0[-]s3))))[×](s2[^]hs0)))), w0)
  plymullem1(s2, hs0, s3, c0, c1, c3, c4, c5, c6, c2, w0)
  fssd(c5, cn0, cc, (c2 ⋃ { 0 }), w0)
  fssd(c6, cn0, cc, (c2 ⋃ { 0 }), w0)
  elplyd(s2, hs0, (c3[+]c4), sum(s3 ∈(0[...]hs0),((c5 ` s3)[×](c6 `(hs0[-]s3)))), (c2 ⋃ { 0 }), w0)
  nn0addcld(c3, c4, w0)
  adantr(w0, hs0 ∈(0[...](c3[+]c4)), sum(s3 ∈(0[...]hs0),((c5 ` s3)[×](c6 `(hs0[-]s3))))∈(c2 ⋃ { 0 }))
  fsumcllem(s3, s0, s1, (0[...]hs0), ((c5 ` s3)[×](c6 `(hs0[-]s3))), (c2 ⋃ { 0 }), w0)

blocks.name: plyadd
blocks.content: The sum of two polynomials is a polynomial. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Jul-2014.)

blocks.name: plymul
blocks.content: The product of two polynomials is a polynomial. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Jul-2014.)
blocks.origin:

  diff.hs6.c(csu(hs3, co(nat0, cfz, cv(hs5)), co(cfv(cv(hs4), cv(hs3)), cmul, co(cv(hs2), cexp, cv(hs3)))))

blocks.name: plysub
blocks.content: The difference of two polynomials is a polynomial. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Jul-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm plysub(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(co(c0, cof(cmin), c1), cfv(cply, c2)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c2)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cfv(cply, c2)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s1), c2))), wcel(co(cv(s0), caddc, cv(s1)), c2))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s1), c2))), wcel(co(cv(s0), cmul, cv(s1)), c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cneg(nat1), c2))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  eqeltrrd(co(c0, cof(cmin), c1), cfv(cply, c2), co(c0, cof(caddc), co(cxp(cc, csn(cneg(nat1))), cof(cmul), c1)), w0)
  mp3an2i(w0, wceq(co(c0, cof(caddc), co(cxp(cc, csn(cneg(nat1))), cof(cmul), c1)), co(c0, cof(cmin), c1)), wcel(cc, universe), wf(c0, cc, cc), wf(c1, cc, cc))
  cnex()
  syl(w0, wf(c0, cc, cc), wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c2)))
  plyf(c0, c2)
  syl(w0, wf(c1, cc, cc), wcel(c1, cfv(cply, c2)))
  plyf(c1, c2)
  ofnegsub(cc, universe, c0, c1)
  plyadd(s0, s1, c0, co(cxp(cc, csn(cneg(nat1))), cof(cmul), c1), c2, w0)
  plymul(s0, s1, cxp(cc, csn(cneg(nat1))), c1, c2, w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(cxp(cc, csn(cneg(nat1))), cfv(cply, c2)), wss(c2, cc), wcel(cneg(nat1), c2))
  syl(w0, wss(c2, cc), wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c2)))
  plybss(c0, c2)
  plyconst(c2, cneg(nat1))
  diff.co.s(s0, cxp(cc, csn(cneg(nat1))), cof(cmul), c1)
  diff.cof.s(s0, cmul)
  diff.cmul.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s1, cxp(cc, csn(cneg(nat1))), cof(cmul), c1)
  diff.cof.s(s1, cmul)
  diff.cmul.s(s1)
  diff.cxp.s(s0, cc, csn(cneg(nat1)))
  diff.cc.s(s0)
  diff.csn.s(s0, cneg(nat1))
  diff.cneg.s(s0, nat1)
  diff.nat1.s(s0)
  diff.cxp.s(s1, cc, csn(cneg(nat1)))
  diff.cc.s(s1)
  diff.csn.s(s1, cneg(nat1))
  diff.cneg.s(s1, nat1)
  diff.nat1.s(s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm plysub(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0[oF(-)]c1)∈(Poly ` c2))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈(Poly ` c2))
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈(Poly ` c2))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧(s0 ∈ c2 ∧ s1 ∈ c2))→(s0[+]s1)∈ c2)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧(s0 ∈ c2 ∧ s1 ∈ c2))→(s0[×]s1)∈ c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → -u(1)∈ c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  eqeltrrd((c0[oF(-)]c1), (Poly ` c2), (c0[oF(+)]((ℂ × { -u(1)})[oF(×)]c1)), w0)
  mp3an2i(w0, (c0[oF(+)]((ℂ × { -u(1)})[oF(×)]c1))=(c0[oF(-)]c1), ℂ ∈ 𝕌, (c0 : ℂ → ℂ), (c1 : ℂ → ℂ))
  cnex()
  syl(w0, (c0 : ℂ → ℂ), c0 ∈(Poly ` c2))
  plyf(c0, c2)
  syl(w0, (c1 : ℂ → ℂ), c1 ∈(Poly ` c2))
  plyf(c1, c2)
  ofnegsub(cc, universe, c0, c1)
  plyadd(s0, s1, c0, ((ℂ × { -u(1)})[oF(×)]c1), c2, w0)
  plymul(s0, s1, (ℂ × { -u(1)}), c1, c2, w0)
  syl2anc(w0, (ℂ × { -u(1)})∈(Poly ` c2), c2 ⊆ ℂ, -u(1)∈ c2)
  syl(w0, c2 ⊆ ℂ, c0 ∈(Poly ` c2))
  plybss(c0, c2)
  plyconst(c2, -u(1))
  diff.co.s(s0, (ℂ × { -u(1)}), oF(×), c1)
  diff.cof.s(s0, cmul)
  diff.cmul.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s1, (ℂ × { -u(1)}), oF(×), c1)
  diff.cof.s(s1, cmul)
  diff.cmul.s(s1)
  diff.cxp.s(s0, cc, { -u(1)})
  diff.cc.s(s0)
  diff.csn.s(s0, -u(1))
  diff.cneg.s(s0, nat1)
  diff.nat1.s(s0)
  diff.cxp.s(s1, cc, { -u(1)})
  diff.cc.s(s1)
  diff.csn.s(s1, -u(1))
  diff.cneg.s(s1, nat1)
  diff.nat1.s(s1)
}

thm plyaddcl(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cply, c1))), wcel(co(c0, cof(caddc), c2), cfv(cply, cc)))
} = {
  plyadd(hs0, hs1, c0, c2, cc, wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cply, c1))))
  sseldi(c0, cfv(cply, cc), cfv(cply, c1), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cply, c1))))
  simpl(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cply, c1)))
  sseldi(c2, cfv(cply, cc), cfv(cply, c1), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cply, c1))))
  plyssc(c1)
  simpr(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cply, c1)))
  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cply, c1))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wcel(cv(hs1), cc)), wcel(co(cv(hs0), caddc, cv(hs1)), cc))
  addcl(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(cc)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(cc)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cply, c1))))
  diff.hs1.w(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cply, c1))))
}

} = {

thm coeval(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wceq(cfv(ccoe, c0), crio(s0, co(cc, cmap, cn0), wrex(s1, cn0, wa(wceq(cima(cv(s0), cfv(cuz, co(cv(s1), caddc, nat1))), csn(nat0)), wceq(c0, cmpt(s2, cc, csu(s3, co(nat0, cfz, cv(s1)), co(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s3)), cmul, co(cv(s2), cexp, cv(s3)))))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wceq(cfv(ccoe, c0), crio(s0, co(cc, cmap, cn0), wrex(s1, cn0, wa(wceq(cima(cv(s0), cfv(cuz, co(cv(s1), caddc, nat1))), csn(nat0)), wceq(c0, cmpt(s2, cc, csu(s3, co(nat0, cfz, cv(s1)), co(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s3)), cmul, co(cv(s2), cexp, cv(s3))))))))))), diffsc(s0, c1))
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wceq(cfv(ccoe, c0), crio(s0, co(cc, cmap, cn0), wrex(s1, cn0, wa(wceq(cima(cv(s0), cfv(cuz, co(cv(s1), caddc, nat1))), csn(nat0)), wceq(c0, cmpt(s2, cc, csu(s3, co(nat0, cfz, cv(s1)), co(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s3)), cmul, co(cv(s2), cexp, cv(s3))))))))))), diffsc(s1, c1))
  syl(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wceq(cfv(ccoe, c0), crio(s0, co(cc, cmap, cn0), wrex(s1, cn0, wa(wceq(cima(cv(s0), cfv(cuz, co(cv(s1), caddc, nat1))), csn(nat0)), wceq(c0, cmpt(s2, cc, csu(s3, co(nat0, cfz, cv(s1)), co(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s3)), cmul, co(cv(s2), cexp, cv(s3)))))))))), wcel(c0, cfv(cply, cc)))
  sseli(c0, cfv(cply, c1), cfv(cply, cc))
  plyssc(c1)

blocks.name: coeeu
blocks.content: Uniqueness of the coefficient function. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 22-Jul-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 23-Aug-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm coeeu(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wreu(s0, co(cc, cmap, cn0), wrex(s1, cn0, wa(wceq(cima(cv(s0), cfv(cuz, co(cv(s1), caddc, nat1))), csn(nat0)), wceq(c0, cmpt(s2, cc, csu(s3, co(nat0, cfz, cv(s1)), co(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s3)), cmul, co(cv(s2), cexp, cv(s3))))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)

blocks.content: Lemma for properties of the coefficient function. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 22-Jul-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 23-Aug-2014.)

thm coelem(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wa(wcel(cfv(ccoe, c0), co(cc, cmap, cn0)), wrex(s0, cn0, wa(wceq(cima(cfv(ccoe, c0), cfv(cuz, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1))), csn(nat0)), wceq(c0, cmpt(s1, cc, csu(s2, co(nat0, cfz, cv(s0)), co(cfv(cfv(ccoe, c0), cv(s2)), cmul, co(cv(s1), cexp, cv(s2))))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
} = {
  sylib(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wa(wcel(cfv(ccoe, c0), co(cc, cmap, cn0)), wrex(s0, cn0, wa(wceq(cima(cfv(ccoe, c0), cfv(cuz, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1))), csn(nat0)), wceq(c0, cmpt(s1, cc, csu(s2, co(nat0, cfz, cv(s0)), co(cfv(cfv(ccoe, c0), cv(s2)), cmul, co(cv(s1), cexp, cv(s2))))))))), wcel(cfv(ccoe, c0), crab(hs0, co(cc, cmap, cn0), wrex(s0, cn0, wa(wceq(cima(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1))), csn(nat0)), wceq(c0, cmpt(s1, cc, csu(s2, co(nat0, cfz, cv(s0)), co(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s2)), cmul, co(cv(s1), cexp, cv(s2)))))))))))
  eqeltrd(cfv(ccoe, c0), crab(hs0, co(cc, cmap, cn0), wrex(s0, cn0, wa(wceq(cima(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1))), csn(nat0)), wceq(c0, cmpt(s1, cc, csu(s2, co(nat0, cfz, cv(s0)), co(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s2)), cmul, co(cv(s1), cexp, cv(s2))))))))), crio(hs0, co(cc, cmap, cn0), wrex(s0, cn0, wa(wceq(cima(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1))), csn(nat0)), wceq(c0, cmpt(s1, cc, csu(s2, co(nat0, cfz, cv(s0)), co(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s2)), cmul, co(cv(s1), cexp, cv(s2))))))))), wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)))
  coeval(hs0, s0, s1, s2, c0, c1)
  syl(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(crio(hs0, co(cc, cmap, cn0), wrex(s0, cn0, wa(wceq(cima(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1))), csn(nat0)), wceq(c0, cmpt(s1, cc, csu(s2, co(nat0, cfz, cv(s0)), co(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s2)), cmul, co(cv(s1), cexp, cv(s2))))))))), crab(hs0, co(cc, cmap, cn0), wrex(s0, cn0, wa(wceq(cima(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1))), csn(nat0)), wceq(c0, cmpt(s1, cc, csu(s2, co(nat0, cfz, cv(s0)), co(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s2)), cmul, co(cv(s1), cexp, cv(s2)))))))))), wreu(hs0, co(cc, cmap, cn0), wrex(s0, cn0, wa(wceq(cima(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1))), csn(nat0)), wceq(c0, cmpt(s1, cc, csu(s2, co(nat0, cfz, cv(s0)), co(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s2)), cmul, co(cv(s1), cexp, cv(s2))))))))))
  coeeu(hs0, s0, s1, s2, c0, c1)
  riotacl2(hs0, co(cc, cmap, cn0), wrex(s0, cn0, wa(wceq(cima(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1))), csn(nat0)), wceq(c0, cmpt(s1, cc, csu(s2, co(nat0, cfz, cv(s0)), co(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s2)), cmul, co(cv(s1), cexp, cv(s2)))))))))
  elrab(hs0, cfv(ccoe, c0), co(cc, cmap, cn0), wrex(s0, cn0, wa(wceq(cima(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1))), csn(nat0)), wceq(c0, cmpt(s1, cc, csu(s2, co(nat0, cfz, cv(s0)), co(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s2)), cmul, co(cv(s1), cexp, cv(s2)))))))), wrex(s0, cn0, wa(wceq(cima(cfv(ccoe, c0), cfv(cuz, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1))), csn(nat0)), wceq(c0, cmpt(s1, cc, csu(s2, co(nat0, cfz, cv(s0)), co(cfv(cfv(ccoe, c0), cv(s2)), cmul, co(cv(s1), cexp, cv(s2)))))))))
  rexbidv(s0, cn0, wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(ccoe, c0)), wa(wceq(cima(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1))), csn(nat0)), wceq(c0, cmpt(s1, cc, csu(s2, co(nat0, cfz, cv(s0)), co(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s2)), cmul, co(cv(s1), cexp, cv(s2))))))), wa(wceq(cima(cfv(ccoe, c0), cfv(cuz, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1))), csn(nat0)), wceq(c0, cmpt(s1, cc, csu(s2, co(nat0, cfz, cv(s0)), co(cfv(cfv(ccoe, c0), cv(s2)), cmul, co(cv(s1), cexp, cv(s2))))))))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(ccoe, c0)), wceq(cima(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1))), csn(nat0)), wceq(c0, cmpt(s1, cc, csu(s2, co(nat0, cfz, cv(s0)), co(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s2)), cmul, co(cv(s1), cexp, cv(s2)))))), wceq(cima(cfv(ccoe, c0), cfv(cuz, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1))), csn(nat0)), wceq(c0, cmpt(s1, cc, csu(s2, co(nat0, cfz, cv(s0)), co(cfv(cfv(ccoe, c0), cv(s2)), cmul, co(cv(s1), cexp, cv(s2)))))))
  eqeq1d(cima(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1))), csn(nat0), cima(cfv(ccoe, c0), cfv(cuz, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1))), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(ccoe, c0)))
  imaeq1(cv(hs0), cfv(ccoe, c0), cfv(cuz, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1)))
  eqeq2d(c0, cmpt(s1, cc, csu(s2, co(nat0, cfz, cv(s0)), co(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s2)), cmul, co(cv(s1), cexp, cv(s2))))), cmpt(s1, cc, csu(s2, co(nat0, cfz, cv(s0)), co(cfv(cfv(ccoe, c0), cv(s2)), cmul, co(cv(s1), cexp, cv(s2))))), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(ccoe, c0)))
  mpteq2dv(s1, cc, csu(s2, co(nat0, cfz, cv(s0)), co(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s2)), cmul, co(cv(s1), cexp, cv(s2)))), csu(s2, co(nat0, cfz, cv(s0)), co(cfv(cfv(ccoe, c0), cv(s2)), cmul, co(cv(s1), cexp, cv(s2)))), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(ccoe, c0)))
  sumeq2sdv(s2, co(nat0, cfz, cv(s0)), co(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s2)), cmul, co(cv(s1), cexp, cv(s2))), co(cfv(cfv(ccoe, c0), cv(s2)), cmul, co(cv(s1), cexp, cv(s2))), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(ccoe, c0)))
  oveq1d(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s2)), cmul, co(cv(s1), cexp, cv(s2)), cfv(cfv(ccoe, c0), cv(s2)), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(ccoe, c0)))
  fveq1(cv(hs0), cfv(ccoe, c0), cv(s2))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(ccoe, c0))
  diff.hs0.c(co(cc, cmap, cn0))
  diff.hs0.w(wrex(s0, cn0, wa(wceq(cima(cfv(ccoe, c0), cfv(cuz, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1))), csn(nat0)), wceq(c0, cmpt(s1, cc, csu(s2, co(nat0, cfz, cv(s0)), co(cfv(cfv(ccoe, c0), cv(s2)), cmul, co(cv(s1), cexp, cv(s2)))))))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), cfv(ccoe, c0))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, ccoe, c0)
  diff.ccoe.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs0), cfv(ccoe, c0))

  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, ccoe, c0)
  diff.ccoe.s(s1)

  diff.nat0.s(s2)
  diff.cfz.s(s2)

blocks.name: coeeq
blocks.content: If ` A ` satisfies the properties of the coefficient function, it must be equal to the coefficient function. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 22-Jul-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 23-Aug-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm coeeq(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(ccoe, c0), c1))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c2)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cn0))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c1, cn0, cc))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cima(c1, cfv(cuz, co(c3, caddc, nat1))), csn(nat0)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, cc, csu(s1, co(nat0, cfz, c3), co(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cmul, co(cv(s0), cexp, cv(s1)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
} = {
  eqtrd(cfv(ccoe, c0), c1, crio(hs0, co(cc, cmap, cn0), wrex(hs1, cn0, wa(wceq(cima(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1))), csn(nat0)), wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, cc, csu(s1, co(nat0, cfz, cv(hs1)), co(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), cmul, co(cv(s0), cexp, cv(s1))))))))), w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(cfv(ccoe, c0), crio(hs0, co(cc, cmap, cn0), wrex(hs1, cn0, wa(wceq(cima(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1))), csn(nat0)), wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, cc, csu(s1, co(nat0, cfz, cv(hs1)), co(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), cmul, co(cv(s0), cexp, cv(s1)))))))))), wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c2)))
  coeval(hs0, hs1, s0, s1, c0, c2)
  mpbid(w0, wceq(crio(hs0, co(cc, cmap, cn0), wrex(hs1, cn0, wa(wceq(cima(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1))), csn(nat0)), wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, cc, csu(s1, co(nat0, cfz, cv(hs1)), co(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), cmul, co(cv(s0), cexp, cv(s1))))))))), c1), wrex(hs1, cn0, wa(wceq(cima(c1, cfv(cuz, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1))), csn(nat0)), wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, cc, csu(s1, co(nat0, cfz, cv(hs1)), co(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cmul, co(cv(s0), cexp, cv(s1)))))))))
  syl12anc(w0, wrex(hs1, cn0, wa(wceq(cima(c1, cfv(cuz, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1))), csn(nat0)), wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, cc, csu(s1, co(nat0, cfz, cv(hs1)), co(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cmul, co(cv(s0), cexp, cv(s1)))))))), wcel(c3, cn0), wceq(cima(c1, cfv(cuz, co(c3, caddc, nat1))), csn(nat0)), wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, cc, csu(s1, co(nat0, cfz, c3), co(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cmul, co(cv(s0), cexp, cv(s1)))))))
  rspcev(hs1, c3, cn0, wa(wceq(cima(c1, cfv(cuz, co(c3, caddc, nat1))), csn(nat0)), wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, cc, csu(s1, co(nat0, cfz, c3), co(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cmul, co(cv(s0), cexp, cv(s1))))))), wa(wceq(cima(c1, cfv(cuz, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1))), csn(nat0)), wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, cc, csu(s1, co(nat0, cfz, cv(hs1)), co(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cmul, co(cv(s0), cexp, cv(s1))))))))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs1), c3), wceq(cima(c1, cfv(cuz, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1))), csn(nat0)), wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, cc, csu(s1, co(nat0, cfz, cv(hs1)), co(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cmul, co(cv(s0), cexp, cv(s1)))))), wceq(cima(c1, cfv(cuz, co(c3, caddc, nat1))), csn(nat0)), wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, cc, csu(s1, co(nat0, cfz, c3), co(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cmul, co(cv(s0), cexp, cv(s1)))))))
  eqeq1d(cima(c1, cfv(cuz, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1))), csn(nat0), cima(c1, cfv(cuz, co(c3, caddc, nat1))), wceq(cv(hs1), c3))
  imaeq2d(c1, cfv(cuz, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1)), cfv(cuz, co(c3, caddc, nat1)), wceq(cv(hs1), c3))
  fvoveq1(cv(hs1), c3, cuz, caddc, nat1)
  eqeq2d(c0, cmpt(s0, cc, csu(s1, co(nat0, cfz, cv(hs1)), co(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cmul, co(cv(s0), cexp, cv(s1))))), cmpt(s0, cc, csu(s1, co(nat0, cfz, c3), co(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cmul, co(cv(s0), cexp, cv(s1))))), wceq(cv(hs1), c3))
  mpteq2dv(s0, cc, csu(s1, co(nat0, cfz, cv(hs1)), co(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cmul, co(cv(s0), cexp, cv(s1)))), csu(s1, co(nat0, cfz, c3), co(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cmul, co(cv(s0), cexp, cv(s1)))), wceq(cv(hs1), c3))
  sumeq1d(s1, co(nat0, cfz, cv(hs1)), co(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cmul, co(cv(s0), cexp, cv(s1))), co(nat0, cfz, c3), wceq(cv(hs1), c3))
  oveq2(cv(hs1), c3, nat0, cfz)
  syl2anc(w0, wb(wrex(hs1, cn0, wa(wceq(cima(c1, cfv(cuz, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1))), csn(nat0)), wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, cc, csu(s1, co(nat0, cfz, cv(hs1)), co(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cmul, co(cv(s0), cexp, cv(s1)))))))), wceq(crio(hs0, co(cc, cmap, cn0), wrex(hs1, cn0, wa(wceq(cima(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1))), csn(nat0)), wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, cc, csu(s1, co(nat0, cfz, cv(hs1)), co(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), cmul, co(cv(s0), cexp, cv(s1))))))))), c1)), wcel(c1, co(cc, cmap, cn0)), wreu(hs0, co(cc, cmap, cn0), wrex(hs1, cn0, wa(wceq(cima(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1))), csn(nat0)), wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, cc, csu(s1, co(nat0, cfz, cv(hs1)), co(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), cmul, co(cv(s0), cexp, cv(s1))))))))))
  sylibr(w0, wcel(c1, co(cc, cmap, cn0)), wf(c1, cn0, cc))
  elmap(c1, cc, cn0)
  cnex()
  nn0ex()
  syl(w0, wreu(hs0, co(cc, cmap, cn0), wrex(hs1, cn0, wa(wceq(cima(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1))), csn(nat0)), wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, cc, csu(s1, co(nat0, cfz, cv(hs1)), co(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), cmul, co(cv(s0), cexp, cv(s1))))))))), wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c2)))
  coeeu(hs0, hs1, s0, s1, c0, c2)

thm dgrval(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wceq(cfv(cdgr, c0), csup(cima(ccnv(c2), cdif(cc, csn(nat0))), cn0, clt)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(ccoe, c0))
} = {
  syl(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wceq(cfv(cdgr, c0), csup(cima(ccnv(c2), cdif(cc, csn(nat0))), cn0, clt)), wcel(c0, cfv(cply, cc)))
  sseli(c0, cfv(cply, c1), cfv(cply, cc))
  plyssc(c1)
  fvmpt(hs0, c0, cfv(cply, cc), cdgr, csup(cima(ccnv(c2), cdif(cc, csn(nat0))), cn0, clt), csup(cima(ccnv(cfv(ccoe, cv(hs0))), cdif(cc, csn(nat0))), cn0, clt))
  supeq1d(cima(ccnv(cfv(ccoe, cv(hs0))), cdif(cc, csn(nat0))), cn0, clt, cima(ccnv(c2), cdif(cc, csn(nat0))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  imaeq1d(ccnv(cfv(ccoe, cv(hs0))), cdif(cc, csn(nat0)), ccnv(c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  cnveqd(cfv(ccoe, cv(hs0)), c2, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  syl6eqr(cfv(ccoe, cv(hs0)), c2, cfv(ccoe, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, ccoe)
  df-dgr(hs0)
  supex(cima(ccnv(c2), cdif(cc, csn(nat0))), cn0, clt)
  mp2(wor(clt, cn0), wss(cn0, cr), wor(clt, cr))
  nn0ssre()
  ltso()
  soss(cn0, cr, clt)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cply, cc))
  diff.hs0.c(csup(cima(ccnv(c2), cdif(cc, csn(nat0))), cn0, clt))
}

thm dgrval(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈(Poly ` c1)→(deg ` c0)= sup((`' c2 "(ℂ \ { 0 })), ℕ0, <))
  ⊣ c2 =(coeff ` c0)
} = {
  syl(c0 ∈(Poly ` c1), (deg ` c0)= sup((`' c2 "(ℂ \ { 0 })), ℕ0, <), c0 ∈(Poly ` ℂ))
  sseli(c0, (Poly ` c1), (Poly ` ℂ))
  plyssc(c1)
  fvmpt(hs0, c0, (Poly ` ℂ), cdgr, sup((`' c2 "(ℂ \ { 0 })), ℕ0, <), sup((`'(coeff ` hs0)"(ℂ \ { 0 })), ℕ0, <))
  supeq1d((`'(coeff ` hs0)"(ℂ \ { 0 })), cn0, clt, (`' c2 "(ℂ \ { 0 })), hs0 = c0)
  imaeq1d(`'(coeff ` hs0), (ℂ \ { 0 }), `' c2, hs0 = c0)
  cnveqd((coeff ` hs0), c2, hs0 = c0)
  syl6eqr((coeff ` hs0), c2, (coeff ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, ccoe)
  df-dgr(hs0)
  supex((`' c2 "(ℂ \ { 0 })), cn0, clt)
  mp2(< ≺ ℕ0, ℕ0 ⊆ ℝ, < ≺ ℝ)
  nn0ssre()
  ltso()
  soss(cn0, cr, clt)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c((Poly ` ℂ))
  diff.hs0.c(sup((`' c2 "(ℂ \ { 0 })), ℕ0, <))
}

thm coef(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wf(c2, cn0, cun(c1, csn(nat0))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(ccoe, c0))
} = {
  simpld(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wf(c2, cn0, cun(c1, csn(nat0))), wrex(hs1, cz, wral(hs0, cima(ccnv(c2), cdif(cc, csn(nat0))), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(hs1)))))
  dgrlem(hs1, hs0, c0, c1, c2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
}

thm coef(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈(Poly ` c1)→(c2 : ℕ0 →(c1 ⋃ { 0 })))
  ⊣ c2 =(coeff ` c0)
} = {
  simpld(c0 ∈(Poly ` c1), (c2 : ℕ0 →(c1 ⋃ { 0 })), ∃(hs1 ∈ ℤ, ∀(hs0 ∈(`' c2 "(ℂ \ { 0 })), hs0[≤]hs1)))
  dgrlem(hs1, hs0, c0, c1, c2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
}

blocks.name: coeid
blocks.content: Reconstruct a polynomial as an explicit sum of the coefficient function up to the degree of the polynomial. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 22-Jul-2014.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: plyco
blocks.content: The composition of two polynomials is a polynomial. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Jul-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 23-Aug-2014.)

blocks.name: coeeq2
blocks.content: Compute the coefficient function given a sum expression for the polynomial. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Jul-2014.)

thm coeeq2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(ccoe, c0), cmpt(s0, cn0, cif(c2, nat0, wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1)))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c3)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cn0))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(nat0, cfz, c1))), wcel(c2, cc))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c0, cmpt(s1, cc, csu(s0, co(nat0, cfz, c1), co(c2, cmul, co(cv(s1), cexp, cv(s0)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  coeeq(s1, hs0, c0, cmpt(s0, cn0, cif(c2, nat0, wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1))), c3, c1, w0)
  mpbird(w0, wceq(cima(cmpt(s0, cn0, cif(c2, nat0, wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1))), cfv(cuz, co(c1, caddc, nat1))), csn(nat0)), wral(hs0, cn0, wi(wne(cfv(cmpt(s0, cn0, cif(c2, nat0, wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1))), cv(hs0)), nat0), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c1))))
  sylib(w0, wral(hs0, cn0, wi(wne(cfv(cmpt(s0, cn0, cif(c2, nat0, wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1))), cv(hs0)), nat0), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c1))), wral(s0, cn0, wi(wne(cfv(cmpt(s0, cn0, cif(c2, nat0, wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1))), cv(s0)), nat0), wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1))))

blocks.name: dgrle
blocks.content: Given an explicit expression for a polynomial, the degree is at most the highest term in the sum. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Jul-2014.)

thm dgrle(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(cfv(cdgr, c0), cle, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c2)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cn0))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(nat0, cfz, c1))), wcel(c3, cc))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c0, cmpt(s1, cc, csu(s0, co(nat0, cfz, c1), co(c3, cmul, co(cv(s1), cexp, cv(s0)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  syl3anc(w0, wbr(cfv(cdgr, c0), cle, c1), wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c2)), wcel(c1, cn0), wceq(cima(cfv(ccoe, c0), cfv(cuz, co(c1, caddc, nat1))), csn(nat0)))
  mpbird(w0, wceq(cima(cfv(ccoe, c0), cfv(cuz, co(c1, caddc, nat1))), csn(nat0)), wral(hs0, cn0, wi(wne(cfv(cfv(ccoe, c0), cv(hs0)), nat0), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c1))))
  ralrimiva(hs0, cn0, w0, wi(wne(cfv(cfv(ccoe, c0), cv(hs0)), nat0), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c1)))
  necon1ad(cfv(cfv(ccoe, c0), cv(hs0)), nat0, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cn0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c1))
  ex(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cn0)), wn(wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c1)), wceq(cfv(cfv(ccoe, c0), cv(hs0)), nat0))
  eqtrd(cfv(cfv(ccoe, c0), cv(hs0)), nat0, cfv(cmpt(s0, cn0, cif(c3, nat0, wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1))), cv(hs0)), wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cn0)), wn(wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c1))))
  fveq1d(cfv(ccoe, c0), cv(hs0), cmpt(s0, cn0, cif(c3, nat0, wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1))), wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cn0)), wn(wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c1))))
  ad2antrr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cn0), wn(wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c1)), wceq(cfv(ccoe, c0), cmpt(s0, cn0, cif(c3, nat0, wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1)))))
  coeeq2(s0, s1, c0, c1, c3, c2, w0)
  adantll(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cn0), wn(wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c1)), wceq(cfv(cmpt(s0, cn0, cif(c3, nat0, wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1))), cv(hs0)), nat0))
  imp(wcel(cv(hs0), cn0), wn(wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c1)), wceq(cfv(cmpt(s0, cn0, cif(c3, nat0, wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1))), cv(hs0)), nat0))
  vtoclgaf(s0, cv(hs0), cn0, wi(wn(wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c1)), wceq(cfv(cmpt(s0, cn0, cif(c3, nat0, wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1))), cv(hs0)), nat0)), wi(wn(wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1)), wceq(cfv(cmpt(s0, cn0, cif(c3, nat0, wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1))), cv(s0)), nat0)))
  nfcv(s0, cv(hs0))
  nfim(s0, wn(wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c1)), wceq(cfv(cmpt(s0, cn0, cif(c3, nat0, wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1))), cv(hs0)), nat0))
  nfv(s0, wn(wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c1)))
  nfeq1(s0, cfv(cmpt(s0, cn0, cif(c3, nat0, wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1))), cv(hs0)), nat0)
  nffvmpt1(s0, cn0, cif(c3, nat0, wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1)), cv(hs0))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wn(wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1)), wceq(cfv(cmpt(s0, cn0, cif(c3, nat0, wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1))), cv(s0)), nat0), wn(wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c1)), wceq(cfv(cmpt(s0, cn0, cif(c3, nat0, wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1))), cv(hs0)), nat0))

  syl5ibr(wcel(cv(s0), cn0), wn(wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1)), wceq(cfv(cmpt(s0, cn0, cif(c3, nat0, wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1))), cv(s0)), nat0), wceq(cfv(cid, cif(c3, nat0, wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1))), nat0))
  syl6eq(cfv(cid, cif(c3, nat0, wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1))), nat0, cfv(cid, nat0), wn(wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1)))

  eqeq1d(cfv(cmpt(s0, cn0, cif(c3, nat0, wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1))), cv(s0)), nat0, cfv(cid, cif(c3, nat0, wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1))), wcel(cv(s0), cn0))
  fvmpt2i(s0, cn0, cmpt(s0, cn0, cif(c3, nat0, wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1))), cif(c3, nat0, wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1)))
  eqid(cmpt(s0, cn0, cif(c3, nat0, wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1))))
  syl2anc(w0, wb(wceq(cima(cfv(ccoe, c0), cfv(cuz, co(c1, caddc, nat1))), csn(nat0)), wral(hs0, cn0, wi(wne(cfv(cfv(ccoe, c0), cv(hs0)), nat0), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c1)))), wcel(c1, cn0), wf(cfv(ccoe, c0), cn0, cc))
  syl(w0, wf(cfv(ccoe, c0), cn0, cc), wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c2)))
  coef3(c0, c2, cfv(ccoe, c0))
  plyco0(hs0, c1, cfv(ccoe, c0))
  dgrlb(c0, c2, c1, cfv(ccoe, c0), cfv(cdgr, c0))
  eqid(cfv(ccoe, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cdgr, c0))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.cn0.s(s0)
  diff.wn.s(s0, wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c1))
  diff.wbr.s(s0, cv(hs0), cle, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)

blocks.pretty:
thm dgrle(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(deg ` c0)[≤]c1)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈(Poly ` c2))
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ ℕ0)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈(0[...]c1))→ c3 ∈ ℂ)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 =(s1 ∈ ℂ ↦ sum(s0 ∈(0[...]c1),(c3[×](s1[^]s0)))))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  syl3anc(w0, (deg ` c0)[≤]c1, c0 ∈(Poly ` c2), c1 ∈ ℕ0, ((coeff ` c0)"(ℤ≥ `(c1[+]1)))= { 0 })
  mpbird(w0, ((coeff ` c0)"(ℤ≥ `(c1[+]1)))= { 0 }, ∀(hs0 ∈ ℕ0,(((coeff ` c0)` hs0)≠ 0 → hs0[≤]c1)))
  ralrimiva(hs0, cn0, w0, (((coeff ` c0)` hs0)≠ 0 → hs0[≤]c1))
  necon1ad(((coeff ` c0)` hs0), nat0, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ℕ0), hs0[≤]c1)
  ex((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ℕ0), ¬ hs0[≤]c1, ((coeff ` c0)` hs0)= 0)
  eqtrd(((coeff ` c0)` hs0), nat0, ((s0 ∈ ℕ0 ↦ if(s0[≤]c1, c3, 0))` hs0), ((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ℕ0)∧ ¬ hs0[≤]c1))
  fveq1d((coeff ` c0), hs0, (s0 ∈ ℕ0 ↦ if(s0[≤]c1, c3, 0)), ((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ℕ0)∧ ¬ hs0[≤]c1))

thm dgreq(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {

  -| diffsc(s0, c3)

} = {

  ffvelrn(c3, cn0, cc, cv(s1))
  syl3anc(w0, wbr(c1, cle, cfv(cdgr, c0)), wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c2)), wcel(c1, cn0), wne(cfv(cfv(ccoe, c0), c1), nat0))
  eqnetrd(cfv(cfv(ccoe, c0), c1), nat0, cfv(c3, c1), w0)
  fveq1d(cfv(ccoe, c0), c1, c3, w0)

  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
}

thm coe11(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈(Poly ` c1)∧ c2 ∈(Poly ` c1))→(c0 = c2 ↔ c3 = c4))
  ⊣ c3 =(coeff ` c0)
  ⊣ c4 =(coeff ` c2)
} = {
  impbid2((c0 ∈(Poly ` c1)∧ c2 ∈(Poly ` c1)), c0 = c2, c3 = c4)
  3eqtr4g(c3, c4, (coeff ` c0), (coeff ` c2), c0 = c2)
  fveq2(c0, c2, ccoe)
  3expia(c0 ∈(Poly ` c1), c2 ∈(Poly ` c1), c3 = c4, c0 = c2)
  3eqtr4d(c0, c2, (hs0 ∈ ℂ ↦ sum(hs1 ∈(0[...](deg ` c0)),((c3 ` hs1)[×](hs0[^]hs1)))), (hs0 ∈ ℂ ↦ sum(hs1 ∈(0[...](deg ` c2)),((c4 ` hs1)[×](hs0[^]hs1)))), (c0 ∈(Poly ` c1)∧ c2 ∈(Poly ` c1)∧ c3 = c4))
  mpteq2dv(hs0, cc, sum(hs1 ∈(0[...](deg ` c0)),((c3 ` hs1)[×](hs0[^]hs1))), sum(hs1 ∈(0[...](deg ` c2)),((c4 ` hs1)[×](hs0[^]hs1))), (c0 ∈(Poly ` c1)∧ c2 ∈(Poly ` c1)∧ c3 = c4))
  sumeq12dv(hs1, (0[...](deg ` c0)), ((c3 ` hs1)[×](hs0[^]hs1)), (0[...](deg ` c2)), ((c4 ` hs1)[×](hs0[^]hs1)), (c0 ∈(Poly ` c1)∧ c2 ∈(Poly ` c1)∧ c3 = c4))
  oveq2d(nat0, cfz, (deg ` c0), (deg ` c2), (c0 ∈(Poly ` c1)∧ c2 ∈(Poly ` c1)∧ c3 = c4))
  3eqtr4d((deg ` c0), (deg ` c2), sup((`' c3 "(ℂ \ { 0 })), ℕ0, <), sup((`' c4 "(ℂ \ { 0 })), ℕ0, <), (c0 ∈(Poly ` c1)∧ c2 ∈(Poly ` c1)∧ c3 = c4))

  3ad2ant1(c0 ∈(Poly ` c1), c2 ∈(Poly ` c1), c3 = c4, (deg ` c0)= sup((`' c3 "(ℂ \ { 0 })), ℕ0, <))
  dgrval(c0, c1, c3)
  3ad2ant2(c0 ∈(Poly ` c1), c2 ∈(Poly ` c1), c3 = c4, (deg ` c2)= sup((`' c4 "(ℂ \ { 0 })), ℕ0, <))
  dgrval(c2, c1, c4)
  oveq1d((c3 ` hs1), cmul, (hs0[^]hs1), (c4 ` hs1), ((c0 ∈(Poly ` c1)∧ c2 ∈(Poly ` c1)∧ c3 = c4)∧ hs1 ∈(0[...](deg ` c0))))
  fveq1d(c3, hs1, c4, ((c0 ∈(Poly ` c1)∧ c2 ∈(Poly ` c1)∧ c3 = c4)∧ hs1 ∈(0[...](deg ` c0))))
  simpl3(c0 ∈(Poly ` c1), c2 ∈(Poly ` c1), c3 = c4, hs1 ∈(0[...](deg ` c0)))

  coeid(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, (deg ` c0), c3)

thm coesub(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈(Poly ` c1)∧ c2 ∈(Poly ` c1))→(coeff `(c0[oF(-)]c2))=(c3[oF(-)]c4))
  ⊣ c3 =(coeff ` c0)
  ⊣ c4 =(coeff ` c2)
} = {
  3eqtr3d((coeff `(c0[oF(-)]c2)), (c3[oF(-)]c4), (coeff `(c0[oF(+)]((ℂ × { -u(1)})[oF(×)]c2))), (c3[oF(+)]((ℕ0 × { -u(1)})[oF(×)]c4)), (c0 ∈(Poly ` c1)∧ c2 ∈(Poly ` c1)))
  eqtrd((coeff `(c0[oF(+)]((ℂ × { -u(1)})[oF(×)]c2))), (c3[oF(+)]((ℕ0 × { -u(1)})[oF(×)]c4)), (c3[oF(+)](coeff `((ℂ × { -u(1)})[oF(×)]c2))), (c0 ∈(Poly ` c1)∧ c2 ∈(Poly ` c1)))
  syl2anc((c0 ∈(Poly ` c1)∧ c2 ∈(Poly ` c1)), (coeff `(c0[oF(+)]((ℂ × { -u(1)})[oF(×)]c2)))=(c3[oF(+)](coeff `((ℂ × { -u(1)})[oF(×)]c2))), c0 ∈(Poly ` ℂ), ((ℂ × { -u(1)})[oF(×)]c2)∈(Poly ` ℂ))
  sseldi(c0, (Poly ` ℂ), (Poly ` c1), (c0 ∈(Poly ` c1)∧ c2 ∈(Poly ` c1)))
  simpl(c0 ∈(Poly ` c1), c2 ∈(Poly ` c1))
  sylancr((c0 ∈(Poly ` c1)∧ c2 ∈(Poly ` c1)), ((ℂ × { -u(1)})[oF(×)]c2)∈(Poly ` ℂ), (ℂ × { -u(1)})∈(Poly ` ℂ), c2 ∈(Poly ` ℂ))
  mp2an((ℂ × { -u(1)})∈(Poly ` ℂ), ℂ ⊆ ℂ, -u(1)∈ ℂ)
  ssid(cc)
  plyconst(cc, -u(1))
  plymulcl((ℂ × { -u(1)}), cc, c2)
  coeadd(c0, cc, ((ℂ × { -u(1)})[oF(×)]c2), c3, (coeff `((ℂ × { -u(1)})[oF(×)]c2)))
  eqid((coeff `((ℂ × { -u(1)})[oF(×)]c2)))
  oveq2d(c3, oF(+), (coeff `((ℂ × { -u(1)})[oF(×)]c2)), ((ℕ0 × { -u(1)})[oF(×)]c4), (c0 ∈(Poly ` c1)∧ c2 ∈(Poly ` c1)))
  syl6eqr((coeff `((ℂ × { -u(1)})[oF(×)]c2)), ((ℕ0 × { -u(1)})[oF(×)]c4), ((ℕ0 × { -u(1)})[oF(×)](coeff ` c2)), (c0 ∈(Poly ` c1)∧ c2 ∈(Poly ` c1)))
  sylancr((c0 ∈(Poly ` c1)∧ c2 ∈(Poly ` c1)), (coeff `((ℂ × { -u(1)})[oF(×)]c2))=((ℕ0 × { -u(1)})[oF(×)](coeff ` c2)), -u(1)∈ ℂ, c2 ∈(Poly ` ℂ))
  neg1cn()
  sseldi(c2, (Poly ` ℂ), (Poly ` c1), (c0 ∈(Poly ` c1)∧ c2 ∈(Poly ` c1)))
  plyssc(c1)
  simpr(c0 ∈(Poly ` c1), c2 ∈(Poly ` c1))
  coemulc(-u(1), c2, cc)
  oveq2i((ℕ0 × { -u(1)}), oF(×), c4, (coeff ` c2))
  fveq2d(ccoe, (c0[oF(+)]((ℂ × { -u(1)})[oF(×)]c2)), (c0[oF(-)]c2), (c0 ∈(Poly ` c1)∧ c2 ∈(Poly ` c1)))
  mp3an3an(c0 ∈(Poly ` c1), c2 ∈(Poly ` c1), (c0[oF(+)]((ℂ × { -u(1)})[oF(×)]c2))=(c0[oF(-)]c2), ℂ ∈ 𝕌, (c0 : ℂ → ℂ), (c2 : ℂ → ℂ))
  cnex()
  plyf(c0, c1)
  plyf(c2, c1)
  ofnegsub(cc, universe, c0, c2)
  mp3an3an(c0 ∈(Poly ` c1), c2 ∈(Poly ` c1), (c3[oF(+)]((ℕ0 × { -u(1)})[oF(×)]c4))=(c3[oF(-)]c4), ℕ0 ∈ 𝕌, (c3 : ℕ0 → ℂ), (c4 : ℕ0 → ℂ))
  nn0ex()
  coef3(c0, c1, c3)
  coef3(c2, c1, c4)

}

thm coe1termlem(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ ℂ ∧ c1 ∈ ℕ0)→((coeff ` c2)=(s0 ∈ ℕ0 ↦ if(s0 = c1, c0, 0))∧(c0 ≠ 0 →(deg ` c2)= c1)))
  ⊣ c2 =(s1 ∈ ℂ ↦(c0[×](s1[^]c1)))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)

  coe1termlem(hs0, s0, c0, c1, c3)
  fvmptd3(hs0, cmpt(hs0, cn0, cif(c0, nat0, wceq(cv(hs0), c1))), c2, cif(c0, nat0, wceq(c2, c1)), cn0, cif(c0, nat0, wceq(cv(hs0), c1)), cc, w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cn0), wcel(c2, cn0)))

blocks.name: dgr0
blocks.content: The degree of the zero polynomial is zero. Note: this differs from some other definitions of the degree of the zero polynomial, such as ` -u 1 , -oo ` or undefined. But it is convenient for us to define it this way, so that we have ~ dgrcl , ~ dgreq0 and ~ coeid without having to special-case zero, although ~ plydivalg is a little more complicated as a result. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 22-Jul-2014.)

blocks.name: dgrlt
blocks.content: Two ways to say that the degree of ` F ` is strictly less than ` N ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Jul-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm dgrlt(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cn0)), wb(wo(wceq(c0, c0p), wbr(c3, clt, c2)), wa(wbr(c3, cle, c2), wceq(cfv(c4, c2), nat0))))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cdgr, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(ccoe, c0))
} = {
  impbida(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cn0)), wo(wceq(c0, c0p), wbr(c3, clt, c2)), wa(wbr(c3, cle, c2), wceq(cfv(c4, c2), nat0)))
  jaodan(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cn0)), wceq(c0, c0p), wbr(c3, clt, c2), wa(wbr(c3, cle, c2), wceq(cfv(c4, c2), nat0)))
  jca(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cn0)), wceq(c0, c0p)), wbr(c3, cle, c2), wceq(cfv(c4, c2), nat0))
  eqbrtrd(c3, cle, c2, nat0, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cn0)), wceq(c0, c0p)))
  3eqtr4g(c3, nat0, cfv(cdgr, c0), cfv(cdgr, c0p), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cn0)), wceq(c0, c0p)))
  fveq2d(cdgr, c0, c0p, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cn0)), wceq(c0, c0p)))

blocks.name: dgradd
blocks.content: The degree of a sum of polynomials is at most the maximum of the degrees. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Jul-2014.)

blocks.name: dgradd2
blocks.content: The degree of a sum of polynomials of unequal degrees is the degree of the larger polynomial. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Jul-2014.)

  3adant3(c0 ∈(Poly ` c1), c2 ∈(Poly ` c1), c3[<]c4, (coeff `(c0[oF(+)]c2))=((coeff ` c0)[oF(+)](coeff ` c2)))

thm dgrmul2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {

  simprd(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cply, c1))), wbr(cfv(cdgr, co(c0, cof(cmul), c2)), cle, co(c3, caddc, c4)), wceq(cfv(ccoe, co(c0, cof(cmul), c2)), cmpt(hs0, cn0, csu(hs1, co(nat0, cfz, cv(hs0)), co(cfv(cfv(ccoe, c0), cv(hs1)), cmul, cfv(cfv(ccoe, c2), co(cv(hs0), cmin, cv(hs1))))))))

  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(ccoe, c0))
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(ccoe, c2))
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)

  diff.hs1.c(c3)

blocks.name: dgrsub
blocks.content: The degree of a difference of polynomials is at most the maximum of the degrees. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Jul-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm dgrsub(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cply, c1))), wbr(cfv(cdgr, co(c0, cof(cmin), c2)), cle, cif(c4, c3, wbr(c3, cle, c4))))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cdgr, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cdgr, c2))
} = {
  3brtr3d(cfv(cdgr, co(c0, cof(cmin), c2)), cle, cif(c4, c3, wbr(c3, cle, c4)), cfv(cdgr, co(c0, cof(caddc), co(cxp(cc, csn(cneg(nat1))), cof(cmul), c2))), cif(cfv(cdgr, co(cxp(cc, csn(cneg(nat1))), cof(cmul), c2)), c3, wbr(c3, cle, cfv(cdgr, co(cxp(cc, csn(cneg(nat1))), cof(cmul), c2)))), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cply, c1))))
  syl2an(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cply, c1)), wbr(cfv(cdgr, co(c0, cof(caddc), co(cxp(cc, csn(cneg(nat1))), cof(cmul), c2))), cle, cif(cfv(cdgr, co(cxp(cc, csn(cneg(nat1))), cof(cmul), c2)), c3, wbr(c3, cle, cfv(cdgr, co(cxp(cc, csn(cneg(nat1))), cof(cmul), c2))))), wcel(c0, cfv(cply, cc)), wcel(co(cxp(cc, csn(cneg(nat1))), cof(cmul), c2), cfv(cply, cc)))
  sseli(c0, cfv(cply, c1), cfv(cply, cc))
  sylancr(wcel(c2, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(co(cxp(cc, csn(cneg(nat1))), cof(cmul), c2), cfv(cply, cc)), wcel(cxp(cc, csn(cneg(nat1))), cfv(cply, cc)), wcel(c2, cfv(cply, cc)))
  mp2an(wcel(cxp(cc, csn(cneg(nat1))), cfv(cply, cc)), wss(cc, cc), wcel(cneg(nat1), cc))
  ssid(cc)
  plyconst(cc, cneg(nat1))
  sseli(c2, cfv(cply, c1), cfv(cply, cc))
  plyssc(c1)
  plymulcl(cxp(cc, csn(cneg(nat1))), cc, c2)
  dgradd(c0, cc, co(cxp(cc, csn(cneg(nat1))), cof(cmul), c2), c3, cfv(cdgr, co(cxp(cc, csn(cneg(nat1))), cof(cmul), c2)))
  eqid(cfv(cdgr, co(cxp(cc, csn(cneg(nat1))), cof(cmul), c2)))
  fveq2d(cdgr, co(c0, cof(caddc), co(cxp(cc, csn(cneg(nat1))), cof(cmul), c2)), co(c0, cof(cmin), c2), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cply, c1))))
  mp3an3an(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cply, c1)), wceq(co(c0, cof(caddc), co(cxp(cc, csn(cneg(nat1))), cof(cmul), c2)), co(c0, cof(cmin), c2)), wcel(cc, universe), wf(c0, cc, cc), wf(c2, cc, cc))
  cnex()
  plyf(c0, c1)
  plyf(c2, c1)
  ofnegsub(cc, universe, c0, c2)
  ifbieq1d(cfv(cdgr, co(cxp(cc, csn(cneg(nat1))), cof(cmul), c2)), c3, c4, wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cply, c1))), wbr(c3, cle, cfv(cdgr, co(cxp(cc, csn(cneg(nat1))), cof(cmul), c2))), wbr(c3, cle, c4))
  breq2d(c3, cle, cfv(cdgr, co(cxp(cc, csn(cneg(nat1))), cof(cmul), c2)), c4, wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cply, c1))))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cply, c1)), wceq(cfv(cdgr, co(cxp(cc, csn(cneg(nat1))), cof(cmul), c2)), c4))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cdgr, co(cxp(cc, csn(cneg(nat1))), cof(cmul), c2)), c4, cfv(cdgr, c2), wcel(c2, cfv(cply, c1)))
  mp3an12(wcel(c2, cfv(cply, c1)), wceq(cfv(cdgr, co(cxp(cc, csn(cneg(nat1))), cof(cmul), c2)), cfv(cdgr, c2)), wcel(cneg(nat1), cc), wne(cneg(nat1), nat0))
  neg1cn()
  neg1ne0()
  dgrmulc(cneg(nat1), c2, c1)
}

  3brtr3d((deg `(c0[oF(-)]c2)), cle, if(c3[≤]c4, c4, c3), (deg `(c0[oF(+)]((ℂ × { -u(1)})[oF(×)]c2))), if(c3[≤](deg `((ℂ × { -u(1)})[oF(×)]c2)),(deg `((ℂ × { -u(1)})[oF(×)]c2)), c3), (c0 ∈(Poly ` c1)∧ c2 ∈(Poly ` c1)))

  mp2an((ℂ × { -u(1)})∈(Poly ` ℂ), ℂ ⊆ ℂ, -u(1)∈ ℂ)
  ssid(cc)

  mp3an3an(c0 ∈(Poly ` c1), c2 ∈(Poly ` c1), (c0[oF(+)]((ℂ × { -u(1)})[oF(×)]c2))=(c0[oF(-)]c2), ℂ ∈ 𝕌, (c0 : ℂ → ℂ), (c2 : ℂ → ℂ))
  cnex()
  plyf(c0, c1)

blocks.content: The degree of a composition of two polynomials is the product of the degrees. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Sep-2014.)

blocks.name: plycj
blocks.content: The double conjugation of a polynomial is a polynomial. (The single conjugation is not because our definition of polynomial includes only holomorphic functions, i.e. no dependence on ` ( * `` z ) ` independently of ` z ` .) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Jul-2014.)
blocks.origin:

  bitrd(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, cc), wf(c3, c0, cc)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wceq(cfv(co(c2, cof(cmul), c3), cv(hs0)), nat0), wo(wceq(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), nat0), wceq(cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), nat0)), wceq(co(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cmul, cfv(c3, cv(hs0))), nat0))

blocks.name: plyreres
blocks.content: Real-coefficient polynomials restrict to real functions. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 16-Nov-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm plyreres(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, cr)), wf(cres(c0, cr), cr, cr))
} = {
  sylanbrc(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, cr)), wf(cres(c0, cr), cr, cr), wfn(cres(c0, cr), cr), wss(crn(cres(c0, cr)), cr))
  syl2anc(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, cr)), wss(crn(cres(c0, cr)), cr), wfn(cres(c0, cr), cr), wral(hs0, cr, wcel(cfv(cres(c0, cr), cv(hs0)), cr)))
  mpbird(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, cr)), wfn(cres(c0, cr), cr), wss(cr, cc))
  plybss(c0, cr)
  3syl(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, cr)), wb(wfn(cres(c0, cr), cr), wss(cr, cc)), wf(c0, cc, cc), wfn(c0, cc))
  ffn(c0, cc, cc)
  fnssresb(c0, cc, cr)
  ralrimiva(hs0, cr, wcel(c0, cfv(cply, cr)), wcel(cfv(cres(c0, cr), cv(hs0)), cr))
  eqeltrd(cfv(cres(c0, cr), cv(hs0)), cr, cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, cr)), wcel(cv(hs0), cr)))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, cr)), wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wceq(cfv(cres(c0, cr), cv(hs0)), cfv(c0, cv(hs0))))
  fvres(cv(hs0), cr, c0)
  cjrebd(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, cr)), wcel(cv(hs0), cr)))
  syl2an(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, cr)), wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cc), wf(c0, cc, cc), wcel(cv(hs0), cc))
  plyf(c0, cr)
  ffvelrn(c0, cc, cc, cv(hs0))
  eqtrd(cfv(ccj, cfv(c0, cv(hs0))), cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c0, cfv(ccj, cv(hs0))), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, cr)), wcel(cv(hs0), cr)))
  sylan2(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, cr)), wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wceq(cfv(ccj, cfv(c0, cv(hs0))), cfv(c0, cfv(ccj, cv(hs0)))), wcel(cv(hs0), cc))
  recn(cv(hs0))
  plyrecj(c0, cv(hs0))
  fveq2d(c0, cfv(ccj, cv(hs0)), cv(hs0), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, cr)), wcel(cv(hs0), cr)))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, cr)), wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wceq(cfv(ccj, cv(hs0)), cv(hs0)))
  cjre(cv(hs0))
  fnfvrnss(hs0, cres(c0, cr), cr, cr)
  df-f(cres(c0, cr), cr, cr)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, cr)))
  diff.hs0.c(cres(c0, cr))
  diff.hs0.c(cr)
}

thm plyreres(class c0) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈(Poly ` ℝ)→((c0 |` ℝ): ℝ → ℝ))
} = {
  sylanbrc(c0 ∈(Poly ` ℝ), ((c0 |` ℝ): ℝ → ℝ), (c0 |` ℝ)[Fn]ℝ, ran((c0 |` ℝ))⊆ ℝ)
  syl2anc(c0 ∈(Poly ` ℝ), ran((c0 |` ℝ))⊆ ℝ, (c0 |` ℝ)[Fn]ℝ, ∀(hs0 ∈ ℝ,((c0 |` ℝ)` hs0)∈ ℝ))
  mpbird(c0 ∈(Poly ` ℝ), (c0 |` ℝ)[Fn]ℝ, ℝ ⊆ ℂ)
  plybss(c0, cr)
  3syl(c0 ∈(Poly ` ℝ), ((c0 |` ℝ)[Fn]ℝ ↔ ℝ ⊆ ℂ), (c0 : ℂ → ℂ), c0[Fn]ℂ)
  ffn(c0, cc, cc)
  fnssresb(c0, cc, cr)
  ralrimiva(hs0, cr, c0 ∈(Poly ` ℝ), ((c0 |` ℝ)` hs0)∈ ℝ)
  eqeltrd(((c0 |` ℝ)` hs0), cr, (c0 ` hs0), (c0 ∈(Poly ` ℝ)∧ hs0 ∈ ℝ))
  adantl(c0 ∈(Poly ` ℝ), hs0 ∈ ℝ, ((c0 |` ℝ)` hs0)=(c0 ` hs0))
  fvres(hs0, cr, c0)
  cjrebd((c0 ` hs0), (c0 ∈(Poly ` ℝ)∧ hs0 ∈ ℝ))
  syl2an(c0 ∈(Poly ` ℝ), hs0 ∈ ℝ, (c0 ` hs0)∈ ℂ, (c0 : ℂ → ℂ), hs0 ∈ ℂ)
  plyf(c0, cr)
  ffvelrn(c0, cc, cc, hs0)
  eqtrd((* `(c0 ` hs0)), (c0 ` hs0), (c0 `(* ` hs0)), (c0 ∈(Poly ` ℝ)∧ hs0 ∈ ℝ))
  sylan2(c0 ∈(Poly ` ℝ), hs0 ∈ ℝ, (* `(c0 ` hs0))=(c0 `(* ` hs0)), hs0 ∈ ℂ)
  recn(hs0)
  plyrecj(c0, hs0)
  fveq2d(c0, (* ` hs0), hs0, (c0 ∈(Poly ` ℝ)∧ hs0 ∈ ℝ))
  adantl(c0 ∈(Poly ` ℝ), hs0 ∈ ℝ, (* ` hs0)= hs0)
  cjre(hs0)
  fnfvrnss(hs0, (c0 |` ℝ), cr, cr)
  df-f((c0 |` ℝ), cr, cr)
  diff.hs0.w(c0 ∈(Poly ` ℝ))
  diff.hs0.c((c0 |` ℝ))
  diff.hs0.c(cr)
}

blocks.name: dvply1
blocks.content: Derivative of a polynomial, explicit sum version. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 13-Nov-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 11-Feb-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm dvply1(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(cc, cdv, c0), c1))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, cc, csu(s1, co(nat0, cfz, c2), co(cfv(c3, cv(s1)), cmul, co(cv(s0), cexp, cv(s1)))))))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c1, cmpt(s0, cc, csu(s1, co(nat0, cfz, co(c2, cmin, nat1)), co(cfv(c4, cv(s1)), cmul, co(cv(s0), cexp, cv(s1)))))))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c3, cn0, cc))
  -| wceq(c4, cmpt(s1, cn0, co(co(cv(s1), caddc, nat1), cmul, cfv(c3, co(cv(s1), caddc, nat1)))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cn0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(co(cc, cdv, c0), c1)), diffsc(s0, c4))

blocks.name: dvply2g
blocks.content: The derivative of a polynomial with coefficients in a subring is a polynomial with coefficients in the same ring. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 1-Jan-2017.)

blocks.name: dvply2
blocks.content: The derivative of a polynomial is a polynomial. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 14-Nov-2014.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 1-Jan-2017.)

blocks.name: dvnply2
blocks.content: Polynomials have polynomials as derivatives of all orders. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 1-Jan-2017.)

thm plycpn(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈(Poly ` c1)→ c0 ∈ ⋂ ran((C^n ` ℂ)))
} = {

  ralrimiva(hs1, cn0, c0 ∈(Poly ` c1), c0 ∈((C^n ` ℂ)` hs1))
  mpbir2and((c0 ∈(Poly ` c1)∧ hs1 ∈ ℕ0), c0 ∈((C^n ` ℂ)` hs1), c0 ∈(ℂ[p↦]ℂ), ((ℂ[Dn]c0)` hs1)∈(dom(c0)[-cn->]ℂ))
  syl((c0 ∈(Poly ` c1)∧ hs1 ∈ ℕ0), c0 ∈(ℂ[p↦]ℂ), (c0 : ℂ → ℂ))
  fpm(c0, cc, cc)

  syl((c0 ∈(Poly ` c1)∧ hs1 ∈ ℕ0), ((ℂ[Dn]c0)` hs1)∈(ℂ[-cn->]ℂ), ((ℂ[Dn]c0)` hs1)∈(Poly ` ℂ))
  dvnply(c0, c1, hs1)

  oveq1d(dom(c0), ccncf, cc, cc, (c0 ∈(Poly ` c1)∧ hs1 ∈ ℕ0))

  ssidd(cc, c0 ∈(Poly ` c1))
  elcpn(cc, hs1, c0)
  mp2b((∀(hs0 ∈ ran((C^n ` ℂ)), c0 ∈ hs0)↔ ∀(hs1 ∈ ℕ0, c0 ∈((C^n ` ℂ)` hs1))), ℂ ⊆ ℂ, (C^n ` ℂ)[Fn]ℕ0)
  ssid(cc)

  eleq2(hs0, ((C^n ` ℂ)` hs1), c0)
  elintg(hs0, c0, (Poly ` c1), ran((C^n ` ℂ)))
  diff.hs1.w(c0 ∈(Poly ` c1))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c((C^n ` ℂ))
